data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei, Li, Li-Zhen (2013): Pengzhongiella daicongchaoi gen. et sp. n., a remarkable myrmecophile (Staphylinidae, Pselaphinae, Batrisitae) from the Gaoligong Mountains. ZooKeys 326: 17-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.326.5933, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.326.5933
